com.syndloanhub.loansum.product.facility

Interface Proratable<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the prorated result
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Accrual, FacilityEvent, LoanContractEvent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccruingFee, Borrowing, CommitmentAdjustment, Facility, FixedRateAccrual, FloatingRateAccrual, LoanContract, LoanTrade, LoanTradeList, Repayment

    public interface Proratable<T>
    A loan facility artifact containing global numerical values which can be adjusted down to a specific share based on a specific trade.

    A loan contract transaction is an example of a proratable type. Consider a global repayment of 2MM on a 100MM facility. A participant assigned 50MM of that facility will have a 50% share and thus the 2MM repayment would be prorated to 1MM.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T prorate(com.opengamma.strata.product.ProductTrade trade)
      Prorate a 100% allocation of a security or facility into a partial allocation based on a specific trade.

    • Method Detail

      • prorate

        T prorate(com.opengamma.strata.product.ProductTrade trade)
        Prorate a 100% allocation of a security or facility into a partial allocation based on a specific trade.
        Parameters:
        trade - buy or sell trade representing a full or partial allocation
        Returns:
        prorated instance of type T
